i1.name: Blaze
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Brand's''' [[Champion ability|abilities]] set his targets {{tip|DoT|ablaze}} for 4 seconds, dealing {{ft|{{as|3% of their '''maximum''' health}} over {{fd|3.25}} seconds|{{as|1% of their '''maximum''' health}} every {{fd|1.08{{recurring|3}}}} seconds}} as {{as|magic damage}}. Abilities used on an ''ablazed'' target are empowered and apply other [[stack]]s of ''Blaze'' while also refreshing the duration of the previous ones. A target can have up to 3 ''Blaze'' stacks at the same time. The damage per tick against monsters is increased by 20%, but capped at 80.
Killing an enemy that is ''ablazed'' restores {{as|{{sti|mana|{{passive progression/deprecated version|7|20 to 40|1;3 to 18}} mana}}}}.

After reaching 3 stacks on {{tip|monster|large monsters}} or enemy {{tip|champion|champions}}, an area is marked around the target which grants {{tip|sight}} in its radius and explodes after 2 seconds, consuming all the stacks. All enemies struck are dealt {{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|17|key=%|10 to 14|1 to 17}} '''maximum''' health}} {{as|(+ 2% per 100 AP)}} {{as|of their '''maximum''' health}} as {{as|magic damage}} and have a stack of ''Blaze'' applied to them. ''The explosion will still trigger if the target dies to the ability reaching 3 stacks or during the delay.''
'''Brand''' cannot stack ''Blaze'' more than once on enemies who have exploded in the past 4 seconds.
i1.descriptionHtml: Innate: Brand's Champion ability set his targets ablaze for 4 seconds, dealing as magic damage. Abilities used on an ablazed target are empowered and apply other stacks of Blaze while also refreshing the duration of the previous ones. A target can have up to 3 Blaze stacks at the same time. The damage per tick against monsters is increased by 20%, but capped at 80.Killing an enemy that is ablazed restores Unknown value: passive progression/deprecated version 7 20 to 40 1;3 to 18 mana.After reaching 3 stacks on large monsters or enemy champions, an area is marked around the target which grants sight in its radius and explodes after 2 seconds, consuming all the stacks. All enemies struck are dealt Unknown value: passive progression/deprecated version 17 key=% 10 to 14 1 to 17 maximum health (+ 2% per 100 AP) of their maximum health as magic damage and have a stack of Blaze applied to them. The explosion will still trigger if the target dies to the ability reaching 3 stacks or during the delay.Brand cannot stack Blaze more than once on enemies who have exploded in the past 4 seconds.
i1.notes:
* ''Blaze'' is a debuff that persists through [[death]].
* The explosion is not considered a tether effect and will not affect {{tip|untargetable}} targets, even if the explosion originated from them.
* Each stack deals the damage individually and will always consider the time it was applied for deciding when the ticks will be applied, even when the duration refreshes.
** At sub-optimal applied times, 2 stacks will deal a minimum of {{as|6% '''maximum''' health}} damage over 4 seconds, but will deal {{as|7% '''maximum''' health}} at optimal applied times.
** Against small-medium units 3 stacks will deal a minimum of {{as|9% '''maximum''' health}} at sub-optimal times, but {{as|11% '''maximum''' health}} at optimal times. If these stacks are further {{tt|refreshed|By ablazing a target that's already at 3 stacks}} at optimal times they can deal up to {{as|12% '''maximum''' health}} over 4 seconds.
* The burn is {{tip|persistent damage}} and the explosion is {{tip|area damage}}.

q1.name: Sear
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Brand''' launches a fireball in the target direction that deals {{as|magic damage}} to the first enemy it hits.
{{sbc|{{ai|Blaze|Brand}}:}} The target is also {{tip|stun|stunned}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
q1.descriptionHtml: Active: Brand launches a fireball in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy it hits.Blaze: The target is also stunned for 1.5 seconds.
q1.notes:
* With a cooldown reduction of {{ap|(1-(4-0.25+1100/1600)/(8 to 6))*100|round=ceil}}% to {{ap|(1-(4-0.25-1100/1600)/(8 to 6))*100|round=ceil}}% based on the ranges of applications from the target, it is possible to apply the stun without having to use other abilities. ''Sear'' will apply before the duration of the pre-applied {{ai|Blaze|Brand}} times out.
** The needed cooldown reduction if the target stayed still would be {{ap|(1-(4-0.25)/(8 to 6))*100|round=ceil}}%.
* ''Sear'' will cast from wherever '''Brand''' is at the end of the cast time.

w1.name: Pillar of Flame
description: {{sbc|Active:}} After a{{ft|{{rutngt|0.625}} delay|{{rutngt|0.889}} delay (including the cast time)}}, '''Brand''' erupts the target area in flames, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies within.
w1.descriptionHtml: Active: After a, Brand erupts the target area in flames, dealing magic damage to enemies within.Blaze: Pillar of Flame deals 25% bonus damage.

e1.name: Conflagration
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Brand''' sets the target enemy aflame which also spreads to all enemies near them, dealing {{as|magic damage}}.
''Conflagration spreads to enemies regardless of having {{tip|sight}} of them or not.''
e1.descriptionHtml: Active: Brand sets the target enemy aflame which also spreads to all enemies near them, dealing magic damage.Blaze: Conflagration's spread radius is doubled.Conflagration spreads to enemies regardless of having sight of them or not.

r1.name: Pyroclasm
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Brand''' launches a fireball at the target enemy that bounces between nearby enemies and '''Brand''' up to four times, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies each time.

If ''Pyroclasm's'' current target becomes invalid, it selects a new target at its remaining bounces. The fireball will bounce to '''Brand''' even if he becomes an invalid target while it is currently on a target or is in flight towards him. If there are no nearby valid targets, the fireball fizzles.
''Pyroclasm prioritizes enemy champions, then '''Brand''', then any valid bounce target.''
''The fireball bounces to targets regardless of having {{tip|sight}} of them or not.''
{{sbc|{{ai|Blaze|Brand}}:}} ''Pyroclasm'' {{tip|slow|slows}} enemies hit for {{fd|0.25}} seconds. This can affect the same enemy more than once.
r1.descriptionHtml: Active: Brand launches a fireball at the target enemy that bounces between nearby enemies and Brand up to four times, dealing magic damage to enemies each time.If Pyroclasm's current target becomes invalid, it selects a new target at its remaining bounces. The fireball will bounce to Brand even if he becomes an invalid target while it is currently on a target or is in flight towards him. If there are no nearby valid targets, the fireball fizzles.Pyroclasm prioritizes enemy champions, then Brand, then any valid bounce target.The fireball bounces to targets regardless of having sight of them or not.Blaze: Pyroclasm slows enemies hit for 0.25 seconds. This can affect the same enemy more than once.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|100 to 300}} {{as|(+ 25% AP)}}|Total Single-Target Damage|{{ap|100*3 to 300*3}} {{as|(+ 75% AP)}}}}
r1.notes:
* The fireball may only bounce to valid targets, including '''Brand'''.
* The fireball does not grant {{tip|sight}} of {{tip|stealth|stealthed}} enemies and those in fog of war but it can expose their position.
* If the initial cast target uses {{tip|spell shield}}, ''Pyroclasm'' will not bounce. If the bounce is blocked by an enemy's ''spell shield'' it will not deal any damage, but it will keep on bouncing.
* If the target becomes {{tip|untargetable}}, dies, or '''Brand''' loses {{tip|sight}} of them during the cast time, ''Pyroclasm'' is cancelled but its {{sti|cooldown}} and {{sti|{{as|mana}}}} are refunded.

effects.levelingtext: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|100 to 300}} {{as|(+ 25% AP)}}|Total Single-Target Damage|{{ap|100*3 to 300*3}} {{as|(+ 75% AP)}}}}
